snippet: In a move that is a first for the team, and will give players more Jeff Pentland will direct the hitting duties and Alan Cockrell will be his assistant.
lead_paragraph: In a move that is a first for the team, and will give players more Jeff Pentland will direct the hitting duties and Alan Cockrell will be his assistant.

headline.seo: Jeff Pentland and Alan Cockrell Hired to Jointly Coach Batters
headline.main: Yankees Hire Two Hitting Instructors and Reshuffle Some Coaches
headline.print_headline: Yankees Hire Two Hitting Instructors and Reshuffle Some Coaches
